ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] re: Class Balance
ygData.msgSnippet: hehehe ok i like this topic... here is one for you all.  in butcherblock killing dwarven citizens (it s cheesy but easy, hey that rhymes) i met a level 40
ygData.messageBody:
hehehe ok i like this topic... here is one for you all. in butcherblock
killing dwarven citizens (it's cheesy but easy, hey that rhymes) i met a
level 40 druid. he asked me to help him split up 2 dwarves who were
together. it seemed strange being a druid and all, so i just said use
harmony. he said: "i'm gonna go buy it."

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> He's the
> only cleric I know who though Befallen was way too tough a
> dungeon. Of
> course since he was using his generic DD's instead of his
> undead specific
> ones (which he hadn't bought yet) I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
>
